name: cheerleader
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person, usually a woman or girl in an organized group, who leads the crowd in shouting encouragement and supporting a team at a sports event: She was a cheerleader for the Dallas Cowboys.
franckreporter/E+/GettyImages
someone who strongly supports a particular idea or person: He was a cheerleader for the new economic plan.
